description: The BlackYak Amrit pants are high durability technical shell pant. The use of the new high durability Gore-Tex® Pro Shell three layer creates a best-in-class level of performance. The Amrit pants also feature the new BlackYak Rail Suspender system. This moves the suspender from the traditional “Y” position over the shoulder to a much more ergonomic position on the side.
name: Black Yak Amrit Pants - Mens
